title: R-Tools R-Undelete v4.9.159222 Multilingual
description:
R-Tools R-Undelete v4.9.159222 Multilingual

Using the same unique data recovery technology IntelligentScan as
the heavyweight R-Studio, R-Undelete is an inexpensive and
easy-to-use yet powerful file undelete solution for FAT and NTFS
file systems.
R-Undelete recovers files on any local disks recognized by the
software. In addition, raw file recovery (scan for known file
types) can be used for heavily damaged or unknown file systems.
For user's convenience R-Undelete can be run from disks and folders
context menu. Graphic files, video and audio files can be previewed
before they are recovered.


Languages:
English, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Japanese,
Chinese.


R-UNDELETE
It's easy-to-use yet powerful undelete solution for Windows OS users. In comparison with the free Home version R-UNDELETE recovers lost files from NTFS, NTFS5 (created or updated by Win2000/XP/2003/Vista/2008/Win7/Win8) disks as well as recovers them from FAT (FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, exFAT) disks.


Installation:

Unpack, install the application.

Extract patch.rar to the installation directory, overwriting
existing files.

When installing the portable version, rename the file
rportable.rec in the installation directory, to rportable.rec_

Choose any name/company and use our Keygen to register the
application.

Do not use the update wizard.


NOTE:

The patch only patches the ECDSA public key
